Cryptodash Authenticator Settings Below is your authentication code, to enter when signing in to Cryptodash: Register Account Flash [ON] Flash [OFF] Auto Focus [ON] Auto Focus [OFF] To use the Authenticator, register your Cryptodash account by scanning the provided QR code or manually entering the provided key. Verify the following information is correct: Email: Key: Ne2WwwXegWzlHuD0eriSXx1EaxmQiEW8QMCRcn5RJ78= Correct Incorrect Enter your email address associated with your Cryptodash account and the provided key. Okay you@email.com Register New Account Scan QR Code Manual Entry
General Skip choosing account When the default account is specified Default account Go directly to this account\'s authenticator Sound Effects Play scan sound effect When a QR code is successfully scanned Play clock-ticking sound When time is running out in current cycle Start clock-ticking sound When X seconds remain in the current time cycle d
An error has occurred - please consider reporting this. Cryptodash Authenticator Error Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred that we can\'t recover from. We would greatly appreciate you reporting this error to us so that we can fix it. Thank you for reporting the error!
